news.headline: SEC enforcement lawyer Marc Berger joins Latham firm in NY. Leader in SEC from 2017 to 2021. Offers experience in white-collar defense.
news.summary: Between 2017 and 2021, Marc Berger served as a prominent figure in the SEC's Enforcement Division and New York Regional Office. During this time, he also held the position of Chief of the Securities and Commodities Fraud Task Force in the SDNY. With his extensive background, Berger now joins the firm's top-performing White Collar Defense & Investigations Practice, bringing valuable expertise to the team.

news.headline: Duke Energy Florida provides free energy assessments for homes and businesses after winter weather; encourages customers to complete Home/Business Energy Checks.
news.summary: In St. Petersburg, Florida on February 5, 2025, Duke Energy Florida is urging customers to take advantage of a complimentary Home Energy Check for residential customers and Business Energy Check for commercial customers after a particularly chilly winter season in the Sunshine State.

news.headline: BabyBuddha hosts first Pumpologist Panel in Fort Lee to address mom's breastfeeding concerns on Feb 5, 2025.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Fort Lee, New Jersey, BabyBuddha, a company known for its innovative portable breast pump, acknowledged the difficulties mothers face during the postpartum period, especially with breastfeeding and pumping. Their commitment to assisting mothers in this process is evident as they provide solutions to support them through this challenging journey.

news.headline: Hilton Grand Vacations partners with Operation Homefront for charity in Orlando, Florida.
news.summary: Hilton Grand Vacations recently revealed a new collaboration with Operation Homefront. Operation Homefront is a non-profit organization that provides emergency assistance and morale to military families, offering a range of programs designed to support them. This partnership aims to contribute to the well-being of military families through various initiatives. Hilton Grand Vacations will be working closely with Operation Homefront to provide a host of resources and support for these families. The partnership between the two organizations is expected to benefit a significant number of military families across the country.

news.headline: Solana's price dropped by 4.16% in 24 hours to $204.52 from $227.66, with a 9% decline over the week.
news.summary: Solana (CRYPTO: SOL) has seen a 4.16% drop in price in the last 24 hours, with its value now standing at $204.52. This decline is part of a broader downward trend over the past week, amounting to -9.0%. The cryptocurrency's price has slipped from $227.66 to its current rate. The comparative chart illustrates Solana's price fluctuations and volatility within the last day.

news.headline: Crypto mass adoption could be driven by Africa's challenges and potential, leading to global growth in blockchain tech.
news.summary: In Africa, the distinctive obstacles and expansive opportunities are fueling innovation in the crypto space, possibly accelerating worldwide acceptance and enhancing the usability of blockchain technology.

news.headline: Iteris secures 2-year contract with Minnesota DOT to provide ClearGuide services, ensuring continued use of the platform.
news.summary: A recent announcement from Iteris revealed a contract agreement with the Minnesota Department of Transportation MnDOT. The 2-year deal allows the state to persist in utilizing ClearGuide technology provided by Iteris.

news.headline: Astrolab's FLIP rover to be delivered by Astrobotic's Griffin lander to the Moon's south pole. NASA's CLPS initiative involved.
news.summary: Venturi Astrolab and Astrobotic have revealed that Astrobotic’s Griffin lander will transport Astrolab's rover to the Moon in the Griffin-1 mission. The rover, named FLIP (FLEX Lunar Innovation Platform), will be placed at the Nobile Region of the lunar south pole. Initially intended to carry the VIPER payload for NASA’s Commercial Lunar Payload Services initiative, the Astrobotic mission will now include this new collaboration. This announcement marks a significant step in lunar exploration, with precise details on timing and mission specifics to follow.

news.headline: Vatica Health wins 2025 Best in KLAS Award for Risk Adjustment Software and Professional Services, 3rd year in a row.
news.summary: Vatica Health based in Atlanta has been recognized as the top provider-centric risk adjustment and clinical quality solutions company, securing the Best in KLAS distinction for 2025 in the Risk Adjustment Software and Professional Services sector. This marks the third consecutive year that Vatica has achieved this prestigious recognition. The assessment conducted by KLAS involved extensive research on various vendors in the risk adjustment field, with feedback gathered from numerous health plans and providers through in-depth interviews. Customers evaluated each solution based on six key categories.

news.headline: CACI will attend Barclays 42nd Annual Industrial Select Conference in Reston, Virginia.
news.summary: RESTON, Virginia - CACI has announced its participation in the Barclays 42nd Annual Industrial Select Conference. The event will provide an opportunity for the company to engage with industry leaders and investors. During the conference, CACI will discuss various aspects of its business and present insights into its operations. This participation demonstrates CACI's commitment to fostering connections within the industrial sector.

news.headline: athenahealth wins 3 Best in KLAS awards, incl. Overall Independent Physician Practice Suite, for 2025.
news.summary: Boston-based athenahealth, Inc., a prominent provider of network-enabled software and services for healthcare practices across the country, recently disclosed their success in clinching three prestigious awards in 2025 Best in KLAS. These accolades include Overall Independent Physician Practice Suite - athenahealth, Ambulatory EHR 11-75 Physicians, Independent - athenaClinicals®, and Practice Management 11-75 Physicians, Independent - athenaCollector®. This marks a significant achievement for the company, continuing their streak of recognition from KLAS for the past 19 years, thanks to the invaluable feedback and support from their clientele.

news.headline: Paradox, a conversational AI leader, acquires People Analytics Platform Eqtble to advance AI vision and serve 1,000 clients.
news.summary: In Scottsdale, Arizona on February 5, 2025, Paradox, a conversational AI platform, revealed the acquisition of a people analytics platform. This move comes as the company aims to assist global employers, including notable brands like Chipotle, 7-Eleven, General Motors, and Nestlè, along with almost 1,000 other clients, in streamlining their recruiting and hiring processes.

news.headline: Western DuPage Special Recreation Association streamlines workforce experience saving 500+ hours/year with UKG system.
news.summary: Western DuPage Special Recreation Association, located in Lowell, Mass. and Weston, Fla., has reported saving over 500 hours annually by utilizing UKG to efficiently manage their full-time, part-time, and seasonal staff.

news.headline: Glean reaches $100M ARR in three years, cements as fast-growing SaaS startup with surging demand for AI.
news.summary: A company based in Palo Alto, California, Glean, a leader in Work AI, has revealed today that it has reached a significant milestone by achieving $100 million in annual recurring revenue (ARR) in its previous fiscal year. This achievement solidifies Glean's status as one of the fastest-growing SaaS startups and highlights the increasing demand for AI-driven workplace solutions. By doubling its customer base within the last year, Glean has demonstrated its impact in the dynamic AI sector, joining a select group of high-growth enterprises that have attained this level of success.

news.headline: Clarifai and Arrow Electronics partner to make AI platform available to global distribution network, aiming to accelerate industry adoption.
news.summary: Clarifai has announced that its full-stack AI platform is now accessible to Arrow's global distribution network, allowing for the implementation of scalable AI solutions in various industries. The arrangement was revealed in Washington on February 5, 2025. Clarifai is recognized as a top contender in the AI sector and a trailblazer in the development of full-stack AI solutions. This partnership is set to facilitate the delivery of advanced AI capabilities, reaching a broader audience and heightening the integration of AI technologies across industries.

news.headline: Arbiter launches new brand identity after 40 years, focusing on growth and innovation in event management.
news.summary: Arbiter, a pioneer in athletic and event management, is marking its 40-year legacy with a revamped brand identity. The company headquartered in Sandy, Utah, unveiled its new look on Feb. 5, 2025. The focus is on advancing innovation and streamlining event coordination for schools, officials, and state associations. As a key player in this industry, Arbiter is dedicated to providing efficient solutions for managing events.

news.headline: Prismatic rebrands as Asseta, offers AI agents for family offices, aiming for wealth preservation.
news.summary: In New York, Prismatic, a top financial management solutions provider, has rebranded to Asseta to enhance its dedication to family offices, distinguishing itself in the fintech industry. The rebranding signifies the company's commitment to updating and digitizing financial processes to guarantee transparency, effectiveness, and sustained wealth development for affluent families. Asseta's sophisticated family management platform...

news.headline: Oneness Labs acquires equity in Nekcom Games and introduces $SHOWA to revolutionize gaming finance in New York.
news.summary: A recent acquisition from Oneness Labs has resulted in the company obtaining a stake in Nekcom Games. This move has led to the launch of a new gaming finance project known as $SHOWA. The collaboration aims to innovate and transform the gaming industry.

news.headline: North Carolina expected to lead in franchise business growth in 2025, adding 1,397 new franchises, 14,636 jobs, contributing $35.5 billion to state economy.
news.summary: A recent study projects that in 2025, North Carolina is expected to witness the establishment of 1,397 new local franchise businesses, leading to the creation of 14,636 job opportunities. The franchise sector's impact on the state's economy is estimated to reach $35.5 billion in the same year. This growth in franchises will not only provide avenues for business ownership but also drive economic expansion and foster job growth in North Carolina. The study's findings were announced in Washington on February 5, 2025.

news.headline: STōK Cold Brew Coffee collaborates with Channing Tatum & Wrexham AFC to reach America's biggest stage, adding Hollywood flair.
news.summary: STōK, known for its daring actions akin to its strong coffee, is infusing a touch of Hollywood "magic" into Wrexham AFC, a classic American football tradition. The company, a top player in Ready-To-Drink (RTD) coffee, is embarking on its most ambitious venture yet in LOUISVILLE, Colo., as of Feb. 5, 2025. STōK Cold Brew Coffee aims to elevate the experience by bringing a fusion of Hollywood flair to Wrexham AFC.

news.headline: Metronet to bring 100% fiber-optic internet to Elwood, Indiana with speeds up to 5 gigabits/sec for residents, 10 gigabits/sec for businesses.
news.summary: A company named Metronet, recognized as the "Fastest Major ISP in the Country" by PCMag for two consecutive years, has disclosed its intention to introduce 100% fiber-optic internet in Elwood, Indiana. The initiative involves a substantial private investment in the multimillion-dollar range. This upgraded network will provide high-speed connectivity to numerous residences and commercial establishments. Residents can expect speeds reaching up to five gigabits per second, while businesses will have access to speeds of up to ten gigabits per second. This development aims to enhance the digital infrastructure in the area.

news.headline: Power Grid Components unveils new brand in Bessemer, Alabama, showing commitment to evolving grid solutions.
news.summary: In Bessemer, Alabama, Power Grid Components has unveiled a new brand, marking a significant shift and dedication to providing innovative solutions for the changing grid landscape. This transformation serves as a testament to their commitment to adapt to the evolving needs of the industry.

news.headline: Vitis Technologies acquires Conexio in Cincinnati, marking its third IT acquisition in three years.
news.summary: In the last three years, this acquisition is the third for the company based in Cincinnati. On February 5, 2025, Prosource's IT division, Vitis Technologies, a Blue Ash, Ohio-headquartered technology solutions and managed services provider (MSP), revealed their acquisition.

news.headline: OSG appoints Bill Cullen as Senior VP, Enterprise Sales; brings 30 years of sales experience to team.
news.summary: In Carol Stream, Illinois, on February 5, 2025, OSG, a prominent global company offering cutting-edge Customer Communications Management (CCM) services, proudly announced the addition of Bill Cullen as the new Senior Vice President of Enterprise Sales. Cullen brings an impressive track record of over three decades in sales and sales leadership roles to his new position, further strengthening OSG's sales team.

news.headline: ArborTIMES™ launches ArborAWARDS™ to recognize excellence in tree care. Celebrating workmanship, dedication, professionalism in the industry.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Old Westbury, New York, ArborTIMES™ unveiled ArborAWARDS™, a unique awards initiative in the tree care sector recognizing excellence, commitment, and expertise. This program is exclusively dedicated to honoring exceptional tree care firms for their exceptional service and dedication to professionalism.

news.headline: JW Marriott opens new resort in Maldives, offering modern luxury and rejuvenation. Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: The latest resort by the brand delivers a luxurious getaway with a mix of contemporary opulence, stunning architecture, and peaceful surroundings, offering an ideal environment for relaxation and exploration in MALÉ, Republic of Maldives. Launched on February 5, 2025, this JW Marriott property is part of the Marriott Bonvoy collection.

news.headline: Nestlé Health Science and Tufts University announce Kresko RNAtech as winner of Innovation Challenge, receiving mentorship and support.
news.summary: Kresko RNAtech emerged as the champion and is set to receive comprehensive mentoring, strategic advice, and technical assistance. In addition, the winner will obtain a one-year membership on the Food & Nutrition Innovation Council at the Friedman School. The announcement was made in Bridgewater, NJ on February 5, 2025. Nestlé Health Science, renowned globally, hosted the event and is providing the support.

news.headline: Mondelēz partners with Inter Miami CF for a multi-year deal in South Florida promoting soccer and snacks.
news.summary: A long-term collaboration honoring the vibrant communities of South Florida and the dedicated fans of soccer. Mondelēz, the manufacturer behind popular snacks such as RITZ Crackers, OREO Cookies, and Chips Ahoy! Cookies, has revealed a partnership set to span multiple years in celebration of these aspects. The announcement comes from East Hanover, N.J. and Miami on Feb. 5, 2025.

news.headline: AFSP's 30th Overnight Walk in NYC will welcome thousands across the U.S. to walk dusk to dawn, marking a milestone event.
news.summary: In 2025, a significant event will take place, where thousands of individuals from all over the United States will participate in a walk from dusk until dawn. This event is organized by the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention (AFSP), a prominent organization focused on suicide research and prevention in the U.S. This gathering marks the 30th iteration of the event.

news.headline: American Greetings expands digital gifting partnerships with Virgin Experience Gifts, Songfinch, and Birdie, enhancing convenience.
news.summary: American Greetings has recently formed partnerships with Virgin Experience Gifts, Songfinch, and Birdie to enhance the gift-giving experience with digital greeting cards throughout the year. This exciting news comes from Cleveland on Feb. 5, 2025. The collaborations aim to make gift-giving more convenient and enjoyable. This development is timely as it coincides with Valentine's Day, offering new opportunities for heartfelt gestures. It signifies a step towards modernizing the traditional concept of greeting cards, catering to the digital age.

news.headline: Gleen AI rebrands to Alhena AI, emphasizing transformation from chatbot to powerful omnichannel AI.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in San Francisco, a leading company specializing in AI-driven customer experience solutions, Gleen AI, revealed a significant development - a rebranding as Alhena AI. This shift signifies the company's progression from a mere cost-effective customer support chatbot to a robust omnichannel AI platform. The company's strategic decision showcases its commitment to enhancing customer experiences and adapting to the dynamic market demands. This alteration marks a pivotal moment in Alhena AI's journey towards further innovation and prominence in the industry.

news.headline: February 2025 Services PMI® rose to 52.8%; Business Activity 54.5%, New Orders 51.3%, Employment 52.3%, Supplier Deliveries 53%.
news.summary: In TEMPE, Arizona, on February 5, 2025, the Business Activity Index stands at 54.5%, with the New Orders Index reported at 51.3%, Employment Index at 52.3%, and Supplier Deliveries Index at 53%. These figures have been adjusted annually to better reflect seasonal factors in the calculation of the indexes.

news.headline: Blackbaud K-12 Executive Advisory Board adds new members and director with expertise in independent school market. $BLKB
news.summary: A new executive director has recently joined Blackbaud (NASDAQ: BLKB), a software company specializing in driving social impact, in Charleston, S.C. This individual brings extensive knowledge of the K–12 independent school market to the team, offering valuable insights for technology development. The appointment signifies Blackbaud's commitment to enhancing their offerings for this sector.

news.headline: Azalea Health released a guide to address rural health issues by 2025, aiming to help underserved communities.
news.summary: Key Tactics to Tackle Healthcare Issues in Rural and Underserved Areas ATLANTA, 2/5/2025 - Azalea Health, a top provider of comprehensive cloud-based healthcare IT solutions, revealed their latest guide, The Definitive Strategies for improving medical services in rural and underserved regions.

news.headline: BLANCO celebrates 100th anniversary with new products and brand identity at KBIS 2025. Exciting giveaways and interactive experiences.
news.summary: To commemorate its 100th year in the industry, BLANCO, a top provider of high-end kitchen solutions, is introducing a new product, refreshing its appearance, and offering interactive features, giveaways, and various activities. The celebrations are taking place in Lumberton, N.J., and Toronto on February 5, 2025. This milestone signifies a century of success for BLANCO as a leader in the field of kitchen solutions.

news.headline: Solventum Fluency for Imaging ranked #1 in 2025 Best in KLAS Awards, marking the company's fifth win in the category.
news.summary: In St. Paul, Minnesota on February 5, 2025, Solventum (NYSE: SOLV) revealed that their AI-driven radiology speech reporting tool, Solventum™ Fluency™ for Imaging, has secured the top spot in the 2025 Best in KLAS Awards. This marks the fifth consecutive win for Solventum, showcasing their excellence in software and services.

news.headline: Global Encryption as a Service Market projected to reach $5.98 billion by 2030 from $1.57 billion in 2024, with a CAGR of 24.9%.
news.summary: In Delray Beach, Florida, as of February 5, 2025, a report indicates that the global Encryption as a Service Market is expected to increase significantly. The market size is forecasted to rise from USD 1.57 billion in 2024 to USD 5.98 billion by 2030, representing a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 24.9% over the forecast period. This growth trend suggests a substantial expansion in the market for encryption services in the coming years.

news.headline: NASA forfeited a lunar ride. Startup's rover steps in to fill the void, still heading to the moon.
news.summary: Following the cancellation of the VIPER rover by the space agency, a vacant slot opened up on a private spacecraft set to travel to the lunar surface.

news.headline: New research by Chargeflow shows 80% of chargebacks are abusive, potentially costing merchants $117B annually. U.S. chargeback volume expected to hit 146M in 2026. Customers expect immediate issue resolution, with 85% likely to file chargeback if their complaint isn't addressed promptly.
news.summary: Chargeflow, a chargeback platform for online businesses, conducted a study revealing a surge in unfriendly fraud, potentially costing merchants $117 billion annually. U.S. chargeback transactions are projected to hit 146 million by 2026. The report highlights customers' expectations for prompt issue resolution and immediate communication from merchants. 23% would file a chargeback immediately, while 38% would do so within 1-3 days. 90% attempt to resolve issues directly, but 85% are likely to file a chargeback if not contacted promptly. This emphasizes the importance of quick merchant responses to prevent chargebacks.

news.headline: Land O'Frost cuts labor costs by 20% deploying 5 palletizing robots in Illinois saving on daily expenses.
news.summary: In Chicago, Formic, a provider of Robots-as-a-Service automation for U.S. manufacturers, recently installed five gantry-style palletizing robots at Land O’Frost's Lansing, Illinois plant. This deployment resulted in a 20% daily savings on labor-related operating expenses for the company. The robots replaced manual box-stacking on pallets, allowing employees to shift to roles as robot operators. Through Formic's Full Service Palletizer Rental program, end-of-line production at the facility was optimized, leading to enhanced safety measures, increased production efficiency, and the development of employee skillsets.

news.headline: Enpro (NYSE: NPO) to release Q4 and full year 2024 financial results on February 19 at 6:30am ET, followed by a conference call at 8:30am ET.
news.summary: Enpro (NYSE: NPO) will be announcing its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024 on Wednesday, February 19th at 6:30 am Eastern Time. A conference call discussing the results will follow at 8:30 am ET.

news.headline: Top 25 Most Romantic Historic Hotels of America list for 2025 announced, features top historic hotels.
news.summary: The list of the top 25 most romantic hotels in America for 2025 has been released. These hotels have been recognized for their historical significance and charm.

news.headline: Altria to host webcast at Consumer Analyst Group of New York Conference, highlighting company's updates.
news.summary: Altria, a company based in Richmond, Virginia, will be hosting a webcast from the Consumer Analyst Group of New York Conference. The conference will feature discussions on various consumer-related topics and is expected to attract a large audience. Altria's participation in the event highlights its commitment to engaging with stakeholders and investors. The webcast will provide valuable insights into the company's performance and strategies. The event is significant for Altria as it provides a platform to share updates and key information with shareholders and analysts. Investors and industry experts will be able to gain a deeper understanding of Altria's business operations and future prospects through this webcast.

news.headline: Kenya cuts key interest rate for fourth consecutive time.
Union seeks court block on Treasury giving Musk's DOGE data.
University of Delaware's PCS set to welcome inaugural class of Peak Trust Management Certificate students, reducing industry barriers.
news.summary: In Newark, Delaware, on February 5, 2025, the University of Delaware's Professional and Continuing Studies (PCS) is preparing to launch the inaugural group of Peak Trust Management Certificate students in April. This program aims to break down industry barriers on a national scale to cultivate a new wave of trust experts. The upcoming cohort is significant as it marks the starting point for a program designed to equip individuals with specialized skills and knowledge. This initiative is crucial for addressing industry demands and ensuring the next generation of professionals are adequately prepared.

news.headline: US ISM Services Prices Paid Actual 60.4 (Forecast 65.1, Previous 64.4)
US ISM Services New Orders Actual 51.3 (Forecast -, Previous 54.2)
US ISM Services Employment Actual 52.3 (Forecast -, Previous 51.4)
Dow Jones fell due to strong ADP jobs report, Google, AMD, Uber stocks plunged on earnings.
news.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average experienced a decline on Wednesday following the release of a robust ADP jobs report. Stock prices for Google, AMD, and Uber tumbled after their earnings reports. The unexpected jobs data had a significant impact on the market, leading to a decrease in the Dow Jones index. Investors were taken aback by the performance of these major companies, causing their stocks to plummet. This news highlights the volatility in the stock market as economic indicators and corporate earnings reports continue to influence investor sentiment.
